TopicTitle: I need almost all parts that existed in KSP1, and variations of the same parts.

Articles.Content:
Where are my favorite thoroughbred solid fuel rockets? The Shrimps are gone too. The engine plate is there, but neither the terrier nor the skipper can remove the cover. I miss the cool one-nozzle-ESA edition of the Poodle. Also, the RCS in KSP1 was improved in the later updates but that has not carried over to 2.

I hope almost all parts and variations will be carried over.

PS. of course the DLC's too!
